## Assessment Strategy

### Component Weights

| Component | Weight | Description |
|-----------|--------|-------------|
| Module Exercises | 30% | Hands-on practice (2.5% each) |
| Module Quizzes | 20% | Knowledge checks (1.67% each) |
| Milestone Projects | 20% | Applied checkpoints (10% each) |
| Final Capstone | 30% | Comprehensive project |

### Grading Scale

| Grade | Score Range | Description |
|-------|-------------|-------------|
| A | 90-100% | Excellent - Exceeds expectations |
| B | 80-89% | Good - Meets all expectations |
| C | 70-79% | Satisfactory - Meets minimum |
| F | Below 70% | Needs improvement |

## Certification

### Requirements for Certification
- Complete all 12 modules
- Score 70%+ on all quizzes
- Complete both milestone projects
- Submit final capstone project
- Achieve overall course score of 70%+

### Certificate Details
{{CERTIFICATE_DETAILS}}
